dialogue.text: SONIC MY MAN, I DON'T KNOW HOW I'M KEEPIN' UP WITH YOU RIGHT NOW...
BUT I'M STARTING TO GET EXHAUSTED!!
WELL THEN WHY DID YOU COME ALONG? YOU'RE IN MY WORLD AND YOU'RE GETTING TIRED?
SORRY TO TELL YOU BUT THAT CAN'T FLY HERE. WHAT EXACTLY BROUGHT YOU HERE?
I DON'T KNOW WHY I'M HERE, BUT I COULDN'T HAVE ASKED FOR A BETTER PLACE TO BE!
Ever since I was a kid, I looked up to how courageous and strong you are.
No matter how dire the stakes are, you always go in with no worries! You're everything I'm not.
I WANT TO HELP PEOPLE OUTSIDE OF MUSIC! I want to be strong for my girl...
But everytime she's in a bad situation, I'm helpless. All I can do is rap and sing and hope to win.
I'M TIRED OF BEIN' WEAK, SONIC! I WANNA BE STRONG AND PROTECT THOSE I LOVE!
I understand that. But you have to know that my line of work is FAR more complex than just dealing with drama.
Your best way of becoming strong is going past your limits, pushing boundaries you didn't even know existed!
I'LL DO ANYTHING DAWG, JUST...JUST TELL ME WHAT I CAN DO!
